name: pdf-annotation-service
description: A web-based service for uploading, annotating, and downloading PDF documents with AI-powered annotation capabilities powered by Groq.

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && cd backend && npx prisma migrate dev && npx prisma generate
